alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Edmunds, northwestern Brown and southeastern McPherson Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Elm Lake to Leola. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Frederick and Grassland Colony around 340 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Deerfield Colony, Wetonka, Long Lake Colony and Barnard. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
